tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Fighting Words
programme.desc: A general’s comments about Islam during a church service pit Harm and Mac against each other as a court-martial hearing examines whether those remarks were a danger to national security.(n)

programme.title: JAG: One Big Boat
programme.desc: When a Naval Academy sailing team gets caught in a squall and a team member drowns, Mac and Turner must determine if their driven commander willingly put his crew at risk.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Death At The Mosque
programme.desc: Vukovic is sent to Iraq to defend a Marine who was caught on tape killing a seemingly innocent Iraqi civilian.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Dream Team
programme.desc: A sailor dies during a fight aboard a ship at sea; Bud discovers the explanation. Mattie wakes up and talks. The general announces a reorganization, orders, and a promotion.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Pilot, Part 1 & 2
programme.desc: A woman radar-intercept officer (RIO) disappears at night from an aircraft carrier in the Adriatic Sea. Two JAG lawyers, Lt. Harm Rabb and Lt. Caitlin Pike, investigate and solve. Harm, a former Naval aviator, unexpectedly becomes a hero.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Super Fun Guys
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on the "Super Fun Guy" movie set in Kazakstan in order to disable a Soviet-era nuclear missile being sold by terrorists.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Tech, Drugs, and Rock 'n Roll
programme.desc: Walter's attempt to "normalize" goes horribly wrong when a nefarious virus is uploaded to his computer.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crazy Train
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must stop a sabotaged runaway subway train with Paige and Ralph on board. Also, in his attempt to impress Happy, Toby has his first boxing match.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Area 51
programme.desc: To help fund Walter's research into saving his sister's life, Team Scorpion takes a lucrative job for the CIA to find a top-secret aircraft in the mysterious Area 51.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: US vs. UN vs. UK
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is blackmailed to break into the United Nations to assist in the assassination of a menacing arms dealer.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team visit this deserted old mansion which is way past its original splendour. They are soon surrounded by unexplained activity as something is following them and for at least two members of crew, they are pushed to their very limits.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and the Most Haunted team are invited to the inner sanctum of the Freemasons to investigate the many ghost sightings at Clifton Hall. Even before the investigation starts the team are faced with some of strange phenomena witnessed by others.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Part two of their investigation into Clifton Hall sees the team splitting with going it alone. For one of the team the night becomes terrifying as they find themselves locked in a room with an unseen force.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team take on their largest investigation to date. They have been invited to investigate a large estate where it seems just about every building has a ghostly tale.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Politics
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads down South to help two different families find some closure. First stop is Baton Rouge, Louisiana to investigate the Old State Capital Building, which has endured theCivil War and a congressman's death.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: French Quarter Phantoms
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to America's most haunted city, New Orleans, to investigate the Old U.S. Mint.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 1
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Crossing Over
programme.desc: TAPS calls in the GHI team to investigate the Spalding Inn, a historic property in Whitefield, New Hampshire owned by Jason and Grant.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Risk-All Point
programme.desc: A more powerful Andromeda ship explodes due to likely sabotage, forcing Dylan's crew to save them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Right Horse
programme.desc: Beka endangers both her crew and an entire planet when a former love shows up.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: What Happens to a Rev Deferred?
programme.sub-title: What Happens to a Rev Deferred?
programme.desc: The Andromeda receives a cry for help from Rev Bam.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Point of the Spear
programme.desc: After a Commonwealth planet is attacked by Pyrian pyroformers, Dylan is forced to fight to protect the new planet.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Vault of the Heavens
programme.desc: Dylan hears voices beckoning him to a planet of "fire and ice.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.135
programme.desc: Shady car salesman sacked for BMW lease scam; dealership owner denies fault. Two women brawl over car keying amid infidelity claims against shared ex.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.251
programme.desc: Allegations arise in a lawsuit where a woman sues her ex for a loan to break his apartment lease. A CD collection is withheld amid a dispute between former partners. A man goes into rehab for addiction, leading to his ex-roommate suing after he moved out.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.152
programme.desc: Stolen identity and falsification of billing records are the charges a man lays against his sister’s former landlord.\t\t\t\r\nUnrequited love, a loan to buy school books, and unpaid rent divide former friends.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.87
programme.desc: Man sues ex-wife and her girlfriend for allegedly stealing property; she claims he threatened her life. High school coach sues teenager for totaling motor scooter; teen argues it was his first solo scooter ride.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.28
programme.desc: Denying they sold their friends a lemon, a man and his fiancée sue for slander and harassment/A black Labrador bites an 8-year-old in the face; the child’s mother sues a friend for the cost of plastic surgery to repair the wound.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.121
programme.desc: 12-year-old allegedly vandalizes security system/Man sues ex for damaging home and clothes during break-in attempt. She admits to the damage, claims they're even now.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.249
programme.desc: A woman sues her son for eviction fees and stopping payment on an apartment. A teen's father breaks his son's phone used for alleged drug purchases, leaving the other teen's father with the bill.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.183
programme.desc: A questionable signature on a lease agreement backs a teenager's claim of being scammed on rent. A cheerleading coach faces a lawsuit for allegedly running a school in sub-par facilities without proper credentials.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.191
programme.desc: In a divorce battle, a woman loans $2,000 for legal fees. A karate school owner sues a motorist over a collision impacting business. Teens and moms dispute a traded Ford Mustang's value.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.96
programme.desc: A woman is suing her husband’s ex-wife and teenage daughter for damaging her car when the teenager allegedly pounded it with her fist/A teenager is accused of horsing around and crashing a relative’s Oldsmobile Allero into a curb.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.86
programme.desc: Botched deal to trade babysitting for rent leaves ex-roommates fighting over dumped clothes and unpaid bills. Woman accuses friend of kidnapping her kids during her jail time, refuses to repay dental loan.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay combines the remaining five chefs into one team; the chefs must compete head-to-head with individual dishes to impress trendsetters. Two contestants have a heated power-struggle and chef Ramsay makes a heartfelt offer.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining three chefs must transform classic American dishes into entrées worthy of fine dining; the contestants' mothers vote on their favourite entrées without knowing who made them; chef Ramsay chooses the two finalists.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two chefs design and run their own restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay brings in helping hands to staff the dinner service in the final challenge; tempers flare between competitors; the winner becomes the new head chef of one of Ramsay's Las Vegas restaurants.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Fifteen vie for the position of executive chef at Gordon Ramsay's new restaurant, scheduled to open in the summer of 2008; Gordon gets physically sick from a contestant's concoction; one contestant goes missing.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each team must accurately slice a halibut into six-ounce fillets; one member of each team must work as the maitre d' while the others staff the kitchen; one chef is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Bank
programme.desc: When Jeff screws up paying for Audrey's Pilates classes, he reveals to Adam that he has a 'Bank' of mistakes that she has incurred that he uses to ease her anger. Russell sends an email to Timmy's crush.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Surro-Gate
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey discover surprising news about their surrogate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Handy Man
programme.desc: When Audrey realizes Jeff is getting a bit bored in the bedroom, she tries to spice it up. Russell gets called out on a business trip, but has a fear of flying. He invites Timmy to distract him.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Play Ball
programme.desc: Audrey considers quitting her job when she realizes it's making her life miserable. Although things are heated between Allison and Timmy, she wants to put their sex life aside so they can spend time getting to know each other.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baked
programme.desc: Audrey embarks on a new start after quitting her demanding job; however, her time at home makes her stir crazy, prompting her to start a cookie business. Timmy is getting advice from the guys who encourage him to be more of a dude than a gentleman.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Les-Bro
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey embark on finding a surrogate mother, only to run into problems with the interviewing process. Russell's wealthy mother comes to town, and he reluctantly decides to have her stop paying his rent.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mannequin Head Ball
programme.desc: Stuck with a store Jeff leased for Audrey's fleeting cookie shop, he and Adam stay behind to clean up and discover a new game using the heads of mannequins.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Big Picture
programme.desc: When his mother cuts off Russell’s trust fund, he gets a taste of how life will be after moving in with Timmy. Meanwhile, Audrey helps Jeff impress his boss in order to get a raise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fun Run
programme.desc: After Jeff tells his altruistic co-workers that requests for charity donations are getting out of hand, Audrey enters into a 10K charity event and plans on having Jeff's staff contribute money toward the cause.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Refusing To Budget
programme.desc: Timmy convinces Russell he needs a budget when the utilities are turned off in his apartment. Meanwhile, Audrey has a mentee who wants to see her office and learn about publishing.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bustin' with Justin
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem - Duane Lee is sick.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Vegas or Bust
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket - Heidi and Stephanie.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Playing Possum
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rainy Day Woman
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Irons in the Fire
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rocky Mountain Roundup
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si, it ends up being Si who has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bro'd Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought. There's a lice outbreak at Duck Command.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Razing the Snakes
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of cottonmouth snakes on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Willie uses his business expertise to help Rebecca improve her clothing store.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead. Jase and the guys are inspired to design a product using zip lines that will revolutionize duck hunting.(n)

programme.title: Time Runners
programme.desc: Special Agent Sally Biggs has a secret, she can rewind time whenever she wants. It's enough to make her a celebrity at the FBI and allows her to control almost everything in her life... Except for the disappearance of her husband.(n)

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.(n)

programme.title: The Philadelphia Experiment
programme.desc: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future. Starring: Michael Paré, Nancy Allen, Eric Christmas.(n)

programme.title: The Cobbler
programme.desc: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.(n)

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar® nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13.(n)

programme.title: The Battle of Midway: Dauntless
programme.desc: A U.S. carrier group is positioned off the coast of Midway in June 1942. During the battle, the two-man crew of a U.S. Navy dive bomber is forced to ditch in the sea. Amid the vast openness of the Pacific, the men are forced to face their own mortality.(n)

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Starring Eddie Griffin and Nathan Phillips. With the speedometer maxed out, a group of exotic car fanatics hit the streets in hopes of winning a life-changing sum of 24 million dollars. Every rule is broken as these drivers.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.(n)

programme.title: Under the Mistletoe
programme.desc: Starring Jaime Ray Newman, Michael Shanks, and Conan Graham. At Christmas, the tables turn on a selfless single mom when a local radio station takes over her love life after an innocent call from her 8-year-old son.(n)

programme.title: Beaus Of Holly
programme.desc: Holly proposes to Phil, he confesses he needs to work things out with his ex. Having booked a romantic sleigh ride, Holly pours her heart out to the sleigh driver, Jake. Is Phil really for her, or is Jake the Christmas miracle she's been searching for?(n)

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: A runaway bride does some soul-searching when she’s trapped in a snowed-in cabin with her grandmother and an old flame at Christmas.(n)

programme.title: American Exit
programme.desc: A dying father takes a road trip with his son, to try to rebuild his relationship before he dies.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: The Cradle Will Fall
programme.desc: A County Prosecutor's investigation into the apparent suicide of a pregnant woman is ruled a murder leading her to question suspects at a fertility clinic.(n)

programme.title: Statute Of Limitations
programme.desc: High school sweethearts break into a home which ends badly. One takes the rap and goes to prison. Twenty-two years later he's out and looking to resume their relationship. Just how far will he go to reunite with his high school love?(n)

programme.title: The Changeover
programme.desc: A teen in Christchurch, New Zealand, battles an ancient spirit who slowly drains the life out of her 4-year-old brother.(n)

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.(n)

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark discovers that the new preacher and his wife are impostors planning a robbery.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Marshall Torrance get into trouble with the Army when they try to help a wounded young soldier who deserted.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After Mark contracts typhoid fever and has a vision of his dead mother he no longer seems interested in getting well.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas's returns to town in the company of a shady gambler and is accused of cheating at cards.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Several men are vying for a prosperous rancher's daughter's affections. When she is found dead, one of them becomes the prime suspect in her murder.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas receives a series of mysterious threatening notes from an ex-convict with a grudge.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: To keep his invalid mother happy, an outlaw forces Lucas and Mark to go along with a masquerade that he is the owner of Lucas's ranch.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas helps his former Army captain, now an undercover federal agent, infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An ex-convict is blamed for a brutal crime despite his claims of rehabilitation.(n)

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: An unpopular boy comes across a fallen meteor containing an alien cybersuit that turns him into the kind of kid he's always wanted to be.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Inspired by the classic fairy-tale, we follow a young girl who meets an enchanting woman she believes to be the real “Little Mermaid”. Starring: William Moseley, Poppy Drayton, Loreto Peralta.(n)

programme.title: Soccer Nanny
programme.desc: A recently widowed woman hires a Norwegian soccer player as an au pair to help her with her sons. When he moves to the small town, the family finds that a soccer ball can change sadness into laughter.(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Gold Diggers
programme.desc: A pair of losers marry two elderly sisters, thinking they'll inherit their fortune and Beverly Hills estate.(n)

programme.title: My Bakery in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Two cousins, two kinds of thinking, and a bakery for saving.(n)

programme.title: Battling for Baby
programme.desc: After Katherine (Courteney Cox) decides to return to work to help pay the bills, her baby's grandmothers (Debbie Reynolds & Suzanne Pleshette) argue over who will take care of her child.(n)

programme.title: Don't Ever Leave Me
programme.desc: Jack's grandfather Harry comes out of prison and stays with him in his mews flat.(n)

programme.title: The Frightened City
programme.desc: A small time thief is recruited by a mobster to help with the racketeering. He doesn't like the job, but with the mob on his back, a femme fatale in his bed and a sick friend to care for, he will have to keep all his wits about him.(n)

programme.title: Hidden Homicide
programme.desc: A writer wakes up in a strange place with a gun in his hand and a dead body, but he doesn't remember how he got there or what really happened.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Buddha's Bowl
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Nepal to recover Buddha's fabled overflowing alms bowl for villagers who are building a shrine to the original Buddha.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Headless Nun
programme.desc: When Sydney's plane crashes, she's asked by a group of nuns to find the head of another nun who was decapitated several centuries ago.(n)

programme.title: Black Hole High: Echolocation
programme.desc: After listening to her new CD too loud, Josie develops super-sensitive hearing and echolocation and uses her new power to help Vaughn sneak into Pearadyne Labs.(n)

programme.title: Black Hole High: Stopwatch
programme.desc: Josie and Vaughn go on their first date. Josie's watch allows her to stop time which is good at first until she can't control it and only Lucus can save her. Also Josie finds out who took her missing Qui-chong ball and the return of an old friend.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Rebirth (REDUX)
programme.desc: Percy emerges from hyperspace without Dante or Luc to discover that 15 years have passed. When Percy tries to take legal possession of the Trans-Utopian, she runs into conflict with a starhunter, who is revealed as her cousin Travis, now much older.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Star Crossed (REDUX)
programme.desc: Travis and Callie are hired by the Jup-Fed to arrest Dakkota 79, a Raider leader on the verge of starting a war with the Verran Clan. Rudolfo's inquiry into a possible bounty on Travis leads to complications with his new crewmates.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Biocrime (REDUX)
programme.desc: Travis is hired to apprehend Father Abode, a former student of Dr. Novak, who has been producing genetic mutants for the sexual pleasure of wealthy clients. The chase reveals dark information about Marcus's past.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The Mutant X team embarks on a mission to locate and capture a powerful super-mutant who possesses god-like powers.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Jesse is forced to reconnect with his former fiancée when the Mutant X team learns that her company is involved in the genetic manipulation of crops.(n)

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A mutant who has the ability to interphase with any computer with his mind, who is paralyzed after an encounter with the team, takes over Sanctuary's computers.(n)

programme.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe: The Destroying Ray
programme.desc: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden and Dr. Zarkov return to the planet Mongo for an antidote to the Purple Death, which wreaking destruction on Earth. However, Ming the Merciless has other plans for them.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: A joint Doors International/Taelon venture creates a machine that allows people to vividly relive a memory, but Liam suspects a back alley version of the device is leading to the death of some users.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Once and Future World
programme.desc: Artifacts believed to be Taelon are found in South America. Renee and Liam try to beat Sandoval to the source to determine the importance of the found pieces.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The first pump action shotgun - a Winchester Model 1897; a hunter's collection of prize big game, full-body taxidermy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Ruff Day
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to an auction in Ton's hometown and end up battling with a big-mouthed buyer. They discover a pair of tranquilizer dart guns and also end up fighting with a K9!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Got a Gun
programme.desc: In the affluent area of Mission Hills, CA, Allen and Ton pick up an estate unit that contains a minibike, a Depression-era slot machine and an 1871 Colt revolver.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Ton and Allen duke it out with a local thrift store gang at a Brooklyn storage auction. The guys discover a classic arcade redemption game and a mid-century water cannon designed to fight towering infernos!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Miami Heat
programme.desc: All-terrain Air Commander Hovercraft, a 1970s NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind 1960s Delta Relay rocket.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.(n)
